docs.abstract: Soccer star David Beckham delivers long-awaited announcement that he plans to bring Major League Soccer expansion team to Miami, though significant questions remain about how deal will be financed and on what timetable.

headline.main: Hurdles Ahead for Beckham and M.L.S. in Miami
